about_the_game:
Fech The Ferret is a fast and loud parkour platformer where the faster you go, the better music gets.

The game offers:

  • High speed racing-like platforming

  • A small open world to explore (4 zones at the moment)

  • Parkour and rolling to take advantage of the world design

  • Shared world online play. See your friends online

  • Collectible clothes and comic strips

  • Rhythmic levels

  • A few cutscenes and minigames

  • A cute pink ferret as a protagonist

In this game you get to play as Fech, our pink ferret protagonist, on his first adventure in the region of Marmocle.

Run through an open world and meet quirky animals as you slowly uncover what lies behind the mishaps happening in Marmocle.

Fech The Ferret is a game made for both people who enjoy high speed platforming and players who prefer to enjoy a lush colourful world at their own pace.

Players are free to try reach the end of each zone as quickly as possible making use of Fech's climbing and rolling abilities, or they may take the time to slowly explore the place to collect clothes and comics scattered around the world as well as talk to the various NPCs.

Spread throughout the world you will also find special "ara" levels, these are rhythmic challenges where Fech has to jump and avoid obstacles to the rhythm of the music.

The story starts as Fech wakes up in a strange forest. He hasn't gotten to Marmocle by accident, but he knows barely anything about this land. Unsure on where to go he heads to a pointy structure outside of the forest, away from the dangers of the forest. Soon he gets to meet a strange bird.

The game also features an shared world online mode. Meet with your friends and have some chaotic fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500 / AMD FX 4300
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 / Nvidia MX 130 / AMD Radeon HD 6770
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: The one that comes bundled with your motherboard
  • Additional Notes: you <3
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 9600 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / Nvidia GTX 660 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7790
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: I really can't see why you'd need anything more than that
  • Additional Notes: (seriously though, a game needs a player to be played)
